source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_00<tab>Nothing ever goes smoothly at the 789th Order Dig, and Craftsman Bo Gu knows exactly whom you have to kill to keep it that way.
target: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_00<tab>第789洞穴団の採掘地のクラフトマン789 ボ・グは、恐れていることがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_01<tab>Watchmen of the 271st Order are due at the 789th Order Dig for an inspection, a mission Bo Gu feels is fundamentally incompatible with the dig's dedication to sloth and slapdashery. Derail the inspection using a bang toss at three locations at Iron Lake, then dispatch the watchmen so that they never inspect so much as a nailhead again.
target: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_01<tab>クラフトマン789 ボ・グは、監督役である<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A8601 /var>に、自分たちの実情が発覚するのを恐れているようだ。アイアンレイクにある3箇所の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E934301 /var>」に、騒音を立てる「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E896801 /var>」を使い、現れた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A8601 /var>」を討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_02<tab>You have relieved a sufficient number of watchmen from their duties and successfully prevented significant improvements to the dig's productivity and safety. Report the happy news to 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20A8601 /var>を討伐した。視察がごまかせたことを、第789洞穴団の採掘地の「クラフトマン789 ボ・グ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_03<tab>The shiftless craftsman is delighted by the outcome, and plans to resort to murder for the next inspection as well. Accept it as high praise of your effectiveness, and know that you have served a client well today.
target: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_SEQ_03<tab>クラフトマン789 ボ・グに報告した。彼は冒険者の働きによって視察をごまかせたことに味をしめて、次回も同じ手でごまかそうと考えているようだ。第789洞穴団が立派に働くようになるまで、視察が来たら助けてあげよう……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_TODO_00<tab>Use the bang tosses on target points at Iron Lake, then dispatch at least three 271st Order watchmen.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_TODO_00アイアンレイクのにを使い
を討伐

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_TODO_01<tab>Report to 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_TODO_01<tab>クラフトマン789 ボ・グに報告

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_000<tab>Adventurer, oh, adventurer, we are in trouble, yes, trouble─a pickle, a mess, trouble! Inspectors from the 271st Order are coming to see that all is well with this dig.
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_000冒険者どーの　困りましたーぞ。
ソレガシらの監督役である「」が
この採掘地に　視察に来るようなのですーぞ……。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_001<tab>Pointless it is to turn diligent now, yes, yes. But the adventurer can distract the inspectors, make them too busy being dead to pry into our business!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_001今さら　マジメなふりは　意味ないですゆーえ……
なんとーか　ごまかす手伝いをして　ほしいですーぞ。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_002<tab>Bo Gu has been thinking in between breaks and lunches─plotting, scheming, thinking! This bang toss of Bo Gu's own making, the adventurer will toss as the skulking inspectors pass near─sniffing, prying, skulking!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_002ソレガシ　働く間も惜しんで　その手を考えましたーぞ！
バ・ゴ氏のお手製「」を
ヤツらの近くの「」で　炸裂させてやるんですーぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_003<tab>After the toss comes a bang, yes, yes! The inspectors will come running, the running inspectors will come! Then, confusion─havoc, tumult, confusion! A quick slice and dice, and no more inspection!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_003そしーて　音に驚いて現れた「」を
騒ぎに乗じーて　メタメタのギダギタにするんですーぞ！
マジメに働くーとバカを見ることーを　思い知らせましょーぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_004<tab>Adventurer will set off the bang toss! When the inspectors come running, ambush them, yes, yes! Much ambush will there be, of those who dare come to look and see!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_004「」を炸裂させーて　音に驚いて現れーた
「」を　やっつけるのですーぞ！
視察なんて　クソクラーエですーぞ！

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_020<tab>Oh, the adventurer knows the art of the kill─slice, dice, kill! Bo Gu should not have worried, no. Inspectors deserve to die again for making Bo Gu's nights sleepless!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_020さすがは冒険者どーの　スゴイですーな。
こんなに早く　問題を片付けてしまうとーは。

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_021<tab>How welly-well that went─clean, smooth, welly-well. Much better than putting nose to grindstone or cooking the books. Bo Gu feels much better about the next inspection! We will kill again, yes, yes!
target:
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BOGU_000_021これーは　実にいいですーぞ。
次回の視察があったーら
また　この手でごまかすとしましょうーぞ。
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません

source: TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BALLOON_000_030<tab>Who's setting off bombs on company time? Who!?
TEXT_BANKOB201_01335_BALLOON_000_032<tab>What's the meaning of this─the gist, intent, meaning!?
